quotes.quote: Take my credit card to the hedge fund! I’ll meet you at the martini store!
quotes.author: Jason

quotes.quote: It's like, who died and left Aristotle in charge of ethics?
quotes.author: Eleanor

quotes.quote: I am in paradise! I should be doing paradise things, like rowing out on a lake with a good bottle of wine, reading French poetry.
quotes.author: Chidi

quotes.quote: Want some pizza? Bad Place crew delivered a hundred of these to my office. All Hawaiian, the worst pizza.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: Attention Eleanor Shellstrop and Jason Mendoza. This is the Almighty Judge on High of All Beings Living and Dead for All Eternity. My name is Shawn.
quotes.author: Shawn

quotes.quote: You saw us all on Earth: a selfish ass, an idiot DJ, a tortured academic, a hot, rich fraud with legs for days…side note, I might legit be into Tahani.
quotes.author: Eleanor

quotes.quote: I'm too young to die and too old to eat off the kids' menu. What a stupid age I am.
quotes.author: Jason

quotes.quote: Jason figured it out? Jason? This is a real low point. Yeah, this one hurts.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: They keep their Janets in a neutral pocket dimension beneath the shapeless time void. It's right next to Accounting.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: Actually, it is kind of clever how they punish philosophers. Every day, they make them go to school naked, and then they take a test in a class they've never been to. And then they smash them with hammers. And that part is not so clever.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: No one can ever truly turn over a new leaf. Sure, Ben Affleck told me he'd matured as an artist after he directed Argo, but then, right on schedule, it was, "Guess what, Tahani, I'm gonna be Batman".
quotes.author: Tahani

quotes.quote: They're gonna hang my picture in the Bad Place Hall of Fame right next to the guy who invented bees with teeth.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: I’m telling you, Molotov cocktails work. Anytime I had a problem and I threw a Molotov cocktail, boom! Right away, I had a different problem.
quotes.author: Jason

quotes.quote: Dude! We can get mythical animals? Maybe I’ll get a penguin.
quotes.author: Jason

quotes.quote: I was just in the middle of torturing William Shakespeare by describing the plot of the Entourage movie.
quotes.author: Shawn

quotes.quote: Principles aren’t principles when you pick and choose when you’re gonna follow them.
quotes.author: Chidi

quotes.quote: Any place or thing in the universe can be up to 104% perfect. That’s how you got Beyoncé.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: In the words of one of my actual friends: 'Ya basic'. It's a human insult. It's devastating. You're devastated right now.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: I studied the human concept of friends. I even watched all ten seasons of the show Friends. Boy, those friends really were 'friends', weren't they? Although - and I realise this is the kind of observation that would only occur to the mind of an eternal being. How did they afford that apartment? A waitress and a chef with those Manhattan real estate prices.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: Ugh, I hate jazz. Every jazz song is like 40 minutes long. It's like, we get it. You can blow on a trumpet. Wrap it up, Elton John.
quotes.author: Eleanor

quotes.quote: Why do bad things always happen to mediocre people who are lying about their identities?
quotes.author: Eleanor

quotes.quote: I mean, somebody royally forked up. Somebody forked up. Why can't I say "fork"?
quotes.author: Eleanor

quotes.quote: Welcome to the Good Place. Sponsored by: otters holding hands while they sleep. You know the way you feel when you see a picture of two otters holding hands? That's how you're gonna feel every day.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: And by the way, everyone here thinks I'm Taiwanese. I'm Filipino. That's racist. Heaven is so racist.
quotes.author: Jason

quotes.quote: I came up with hundreds of plans in my life, and only one of them got me killed.
quotes.author: Jason

quotes.quote: Listen, man, I'm dead, you're dead, we all died, and now we're killing her. Pay it forward.
quotes.author: Eleanor

quotes.quote: This is the 3:18 to the Bad Place, making thousands of stops for literally no reason. Now, you'll notice it's very hot in here, and it will get one degree hotter every time you think about how hot it is. Oops. You just thought about it.
quotes.author: Trevor

quotes.quote: I have’’t seen a more perfect couple since I set up Drake with Ruth Bader Ginsburg!
quotes.author: Tahani
